    • {xen:phrase match_exact_word}
    • {xen:phrase match_exact_word}

<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="request_criteria[open_port][rule]" value="open_port" label="{xen:phrase th_user_has_open_port_userregspam}:" selected="{$requestCriteria.open_port}"> <xen:disabled> <xen:spinbox name="request_criteria[open_port][data][port]" value="{$requestCriteria.open_port.port}" /> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:if is="{$countries}"> <xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="request_criteria[geoip_country][rule]" value="geoip_country" label="{xen:phrase th_ip_address_is_registered_in_spamrules}:" selected="{$requestCriteria.geoip_country}"> <xen:disabled> <xen:select name="request_criteria[geoip_country][data][countries]" size="5" multiple="true"> <xen:foreach loop="{$countries}" key="{$isoCode}" value="{$countryTitle}"> <xen:option value="{$isoCode}" label="{$countryTitle}" selected="{$requestCriteria.geoip_country.countries} AND in_array({$isoCode}, {$requestCriteria.geoip_country.countries})" /> </xen:foreach> </xen:select> </xen:disabled> </xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit> </xen:if>

{xen:phrase th_confirm_deletion_of_spam_rule_spamrules}: {$spamRule.title} {xen:phrase th_confirm_deletion_of_spam_rule_spamrules} {$spamRule.title}

{xen:phrase th_please_confirm_want_to_delete_spam_rule_spamrules}:

{$spamRule.title}

{xen:if '{$spamRule.spam_rule_id}', '{xen:phrase th_edit_spam_rule_spamrules}: {$spamRule.title}', '{xen:phrase th_create_new_spam_rule_spamrules}'} {xen:if '{$spamRule.spam_rule_id}', '{xen:phrase th_edit_spam_rule_spamrules}: {$spamRule.title}', '{xen:phrase th_create_new_spam_rule_spamrules}'} {$spamRule.title}

  • {xen:phrase th_request_criteria_spamrules}
  • {xen:phrase manually_approve} {xen:phrase reject}

{xen:phrase th_spam_rules_spamrules} {xen:phrase th_spam_rules_spamrules} + {xen:phrase th_create_new_spam_rule_spamrules}

{xen:phrase th_spam_rules_spamrules}

{xen:phrase showing_x_of_y_items, 'count={xen:count $spamRules}', 'total={xen:count $spamRules}'}

{xen:phrase th_confirm_deletion_of_user_spam_rule_spamrules}: {$userSpamRule.title} {xen:phrase th_confirm_deletion_of_user_spam_rule_spamrules} {$userSpamRule.title}

{xen:phrase th_please_confirm_want_to_delete_user_spam_rule_spamrules}:

{$userSpamRule.title}

  • {xen:phrase date_criteria}
  • {xen:phrase th_request_criteria_spamrules}

phrases.phrase: Options for the Spam Rules by ThemeHouse add-on.
CSV list of ISO countries for use with GeoIP.

Selecting this option will mean that text that has been quoted will not be checked when automatically giving warnings. Note that this will not actually check that text within [quote] tags is a direct quote of some other content.
Confirm Deletion of User Spam Rule
Content contains at least X links
Content contains at least X percent uppercase letters
Please confirm that you want to delete the following spam rule
Please confirm that you want to delete the following user spam rule
The requested spam rule could not be found.
The requested user spam rule could not be found.
There are no user spam rules.
User spam rules are checked against when a user registers for this site.
